## Course Overview

**Course Description**

Welcome to BAT 3301 – Operations Management. During this course, you will learn about the beauty of operations management in many industries. The purpose of this course for you is to understand the common managerial processes for effective operations in both manufacturing and service-oriented industries. In addition, we also want to understand the importance of how profoundly scientific developments in the area of Operations Management (OM) affect society and the environment. Students who have taken this course should be able to demonstrate the proficiency in understanding, analyzing, and modeling problems in support of decision-making in the area of OM. To achieve this goal, we will not only learn from the lectures but also research how the latest companies and business models are being operated.
